A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not the best star wars movie i have ever seen\, however\, it is far from the worst. The fact that this movie has a 57% at the moment is baffling. People didn't like the force awakens because it was too similar to episode IV\, but now this film is bad because it's too different? There is a fair amount in this film that could be changes\, specifically the entire Finn/Girl who's name i cant even remember story line\, but does that make this the worst star wars film? No. Not even close.
